item.title: Pay Attention (acoustic)
item.description:
A barebones acoustic rendition of Pay Attention from my latest album, VX1
Album Version: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-kYUlXvdIJA&t=1380s VX1: https://bpev.me/vx1
Video: Sony rx100 Audio: iPhone SE (the one sitting on the piano)

item.title: Summertime
item.description: Cover of Summertime, composed by George Gershwin for the opera Porgy and Bess

item.title: Little Judgements
item.description: Original Song. Free download on Bandcamp (You can buy for $0): https://ivebencrazy.bandcamp.com/track/little-judgements

item.title: Like Clockwork
item.description: Original Song I wrote a few years back. Figured I should put it on my Youtube. Free download on Bandcamp (You can buy for $0): https://ivebencrazy.bandcamp.com/track/like-clockwork

item.title: The Giant and the Teddy Bear
item.description: Free download on Bandcamp (just select to pay $0): https://ivebencrazy.bandcamp.com/track/the-giant-and-the-teddy-bear

item.title: I Took a Pill in Ibiza - Acappella Cover of Mike Posner
item.description: I originally arranged this for the UCSD Tritones. Check 'em out! https://www.youtube.com/user/ucsdtritones

item.title: Something Suite No 1
item.description:
A song that's just kind of my head going in a bunch of different directions.
Free Download: https://ivebencrazy.bandcamp.com/track/something-suite-no-1 Art By: Lera Romanof (https://www.fiverr.com/valery_romanof)

item.title: Hit the Road Jack - Cover of Percy Mayfield, Ray Charles
item.description: A cover of "Hit the Road Jack", written by Percy Mayfield, and made famous by Ray Charles. Uhhhh... yeah that pretty much describes everything hahaha.

item.title: Legends Never Die - Acappella Cover
item.description: An acappella multitrack cover of the song "Legends Never Die", written by Riot Games for the 2017 League of Legends World Championships, and featured Against the Current.
